channel.title: What do you wan't to see?
channel.description: Hey guys I'm wanting to start a new project but have no idea what to do. So I'm asking for your help! All that I'm asking is that you post below what you would like to see, What kinda server ( 317, 474, ect. ), eco or spawn, ect..

item.title: What do you wan't to see?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

That’s not important, the feeling of walking into a ps and seeing everyone with every 99 everything, is not very motivating, as I prefer challenge, but not as challenging as RS.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you wan't to see?

item.title: What do you wan't to see?
item.dc:creator: @OgTurm OgTurm
item.description:
@OgTurm wrote:

[quote author=runescape sucks link=topic=606411.msg4227390#msg4227390 date=1361070715]
How about what I don’t want to see? (That’s why I clicked here)

[ul][li]I don’t want to see everyone running around with full vesta, all phats, etc.[/li]
[li]I don’t want to see everyone with every 99 already mastered[/li][/ul]

Two very unmotivating things

so then can you please explain to me what the point of runescape PRIVATE servers are for? if we didnt want to have everything dont you think we would play rs?

Read full topic
item.source: What do you wan't to see?

item.title: What do you wan't to see?
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:16, topic:488177”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=606411.msg4229828#msg4229828 date=1361199839]

What I wanna see:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596991.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,594355.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596994.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,597192.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,596978.0.html
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,597117.0.html

I also recommend a 459 or 317. 459 won’t work out since, as I see, RuneScape back in 2007 is coming back.

stfu, your ideas are loveing retarded. a monkey could make those ideas. most of them are just ripped from WoW or another mmorpg and slightly changed.

something no rsps has done before. there’s plenty of content that RUNESCAPE had that we still don’t. I’d like to see people working on that instead of retarded ideas (E.G arham)

Yeah, because duel arenas are SOO unique. I didn’t even say my ideas are good, I just said I wanted to see them in a RSPS.

i don’t see how duel arenas are related, that’s in every server now a days.
[/quote]
I’m talking about your Duel Tournaments.[/quote]

Well that’s still completely irrelevant because I’ve never claimed it to be unique. It’s a nice change anyway, I’ve never seen it done before.

Your ideas are retarded + cannot even be implemented fairly and properly.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you wan't to see?

item.title: What do you wan't to see?
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

I’ve got three categories for you, being: In-Game, Ranks and Website.
In-Game:

[ul][li]Don’t have every person walking around with Torva, partyhats, etc.[/li]
[li]Make it unique. If you are going to use edgeville as your home, at least make it stand out ridiculously from the rest.[/li][/ul]

Ranks:

[ul][li]Bagh. I hate donator ranks in-game. Reserve “donor extreme, donor medium” etc. for the forums as a simple title.[/li]
[li]Admins are for the developers. Moderators are for the helpful-est of the helpful. A good ratio is 1:10 in terms of mods, with mods being the 1, and players being the 10.[/li][/ul]

Website:

[ul][li]DON’T use a webs domain/hosting. Get your own template and use 000webhost.[/li]
[li]PLEASE use good grammar and spelling when being on the forums, it makes your game look more professional and look like you know what you are doing.[/li][/ul]

My rant is done, if you got any questions or need more ideas, hit me up with a PM or my Skype; soccer_flame14

Read full topic
item.source: What do you wan't to see?
